[File: aptos-core/storage/db-tool/src/backup.rs] [Lines: 169-255] [Epoch Boundary Edge Cases] When backup ranges span epoch boundaries, do all backup controllers properly handle reconfiguration events, or can epoch transitions corrupt backup consistency? (High)
